infos.name: Room A
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a Room A.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Golden locker here.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The Golden locker contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The Golden locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: Room B
infos.desc:
Here we are in the Room B. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a Blue locker.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The Blue locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The Blue locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: Room M
infos.desc:
You are in a Room M. An usual one.

 You can see a Azure locker.[if c_12 is open and there is something in the c_12] The Azure locker contains [a list of things in the c_12].[end if][if c_12 is open and the c_12 contains nothing] The Azure locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: Room G
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a Room G.

 You make out a White locker.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The White locker contains [a list of things in the c_6]. Now why would someone leave that there?[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The White locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: Room N
infos.desc:
You're now in a Room N.

 You can see [if c_13 is locked]a locked[else if c_13 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Emerald locker.[if c_13 is open and there is something in the c_13] The Emerald locker contains [a list of things in the c_13].[end if][if c_13 is open and the c_13 contains nothing] The Emerald locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: Room L
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a Room L.

 You see [if c_11 is locked]a locked[else if c_11 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Silver locker.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The Silver locker contains [a list of things in the c_11].[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: Room O
infos.desc:
You are in a Room O. An usual kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can make out a Bronze locker.[if c_14 is open and there is something in the c_14] The Bronze locker contains [a list of things in the c_14].[end if][if c_14 is open and the c_14 contains nothing] The Bronze locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: Room D
infos.desc:
You've entered a Room D. Let's see what's in here.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a Yellow locker. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The Yellow locker contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The Yellow locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: Room C
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a Room C.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a Red locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The Red locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The Red locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: Room I
infos.desc:
You are in a Room I. An ordinary one.

 You can make out [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Brown locker in the corner.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The Brown locker contains [a list of things in the c_8]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The Brown locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: Room K
infos.desc:
You arrive in a Room K. A normal kind of place.

 You smell an awful smell, and follow it to a Crimson locker.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The Crimson locker contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: Room J
infos.desc:
You are in a Room J. An ordinary one.

 You can make out [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Cyan locker right there by you.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The Cyan locker contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The Cyan locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: Room P
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a Room P.

 You see a Black locker.[if c_15 is open and there is something in the c_15] The Black locker contains [a list of things in the c_15]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if c_15 is open and the c_15 contains nothing] The Black locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: Room E
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a Room E. A typical one.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a Grey locker.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The Grey locker contains [a list of things in the c_4]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The Grey locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: Room F
infos.desc:
You've entered a Room F.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a Green locker.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The Green locker contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The Green locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: Room H
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a Room H. An ordinary one.

 Oh, great. Here's a Orange locker. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The Orange locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] What a letdown! The Orange locker is empty![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.
